resources.string:
Vidya Knowledge Park, a group of Jain Minority institutions situated at Meerut symbolizes a very well conceived dream of tranforming education the belt of Western UP and Delhi-NCR.

It is spread across lush green landscape of 75 acres, state of the architecture, harboring more than 3000 students, 500 plus professional teaching and non-teaching staff and best in technology and ambiance.

Awards and achievements

"Excellence And Innovation in Engineering" in Indian Education Award 2015-

Vidya College of Engineering is conferred with Excellence And Innovation in Engineering in Indian Education Award 2015 by FRANCHISE, INDIA.

MOST EMERGING HIGHER EDUCATION INSTITUTE OF THE YEAR 2014 EDUPRENEURS AWARD 2013

Vidya College of Engineering received award from Engineering Watch, Edupreneurs Award, 2013.

A Ranking

Vidya School of Business B & M Chronicle 2013

SOE GLOBAL AWARDS 2012

Vidya College of Engineering received Academic Excellence Award from School of Educators, Global Education Awards, 2012.

A+ Business School (MBA by Choice July 2012)

Vidya School of Business

Included in Dalal Street Best B School Directory 2012
